question: How can I stay up to date with college events?
answer: All event announcements from campus societies are posted right here on this platform. Just check back regularly or turn on notifications if available.

question: How do I get hired into a society?
answer: Societies publish recruitment drives on this platform. Keep an eye on upcoming drives and follow the instructions provided in the post to apply.

question: How do I contact the seniors of a particular society?
answer: You can reach out to the requisite society through their official Instagram handle (almost every society has one). Alternatively, contact surge3-14@gmail.com for guidance.

question: I have new ideas. Whom should I approach?
answer: Feel free to DM the relevant society on Instagram. If you're not sure who to contact, you can always write to surge3-14@gmail.com and you’ll be directed to the right people.

question: I need guidance. What can I do?
answer: You can connect with society members through their Instagram handles. If you're stuck, surge3-14@gmail.com is your fallback option.

question: I'm a society coordinator. How do I post an event?
answer: Log in to your coordinator account, go to the 'Post Event' section, and fill in all required details. Make sure to provide clear descriptions, visuals, and deadlines.

question: What kind of events can be posted here?
answer: You can post society events, workshops, talks, competitions, recruitments, or anything open to the student community that promotes growth and engagement.

question: Who governs these societies?
answer: All student societies operate under the oversight of the Student Council, which ensures smooth coordination, accountability, and equal opportunity across all student-led initiatives.

question: Can I be part of multiple societies?
answer: Yes, students are allowed to join multiple societies as long as they can manage their time and responsibilities efficiently.

question: Is there any eligibility criteria to join a society?
answer: Most societies welcome all students, but some may have basic skill tests or interviews during recruitment. Follow their Instagram handles or posts here for specific details.

question: When do society recruitments usually happen?
answer: Recruitments generally happen at the start of each semester. Keep checking this platform and the Instagram handles of societies for announcements.

question: What if I missed the recruitment drive?
answer: Some societies conduct off-cycle recruitments. You can follow their Instagram for updates or email surge3-14@gmail.com to inquire about alternative options.

question: Are first-years allowed to participate in society events?
answer: Absolutely! Freshers are encouraged to take part in events to build connections, skills, and discover their interests.

question: Can I start my own society?
answer: Yes, you can propose a new society through the Student Council. The process involves submission of a proposal, core team info, and purpose justification.

question: Where can I see past events organized by societies?
answer: This platform archives all events. Scroll through older announcements or visit the Instagram pages of the societies for event highlights.

question: I want to volunteer for events. How can I do that?
answer: Event posts often mention open volunteer roles. DM the respective society on Instagram or email surge3-14@gmail.com to express your interest.

question: How do I give feedback about an event?
answer: Most events have a feedback form shared after completion. If not, you can DM the society on Instagram or write to surge3-14@gmail.com.

question: What benefits do I get by joining a society?
answer: You gain hands-on experience, build a network, improve soft and technical skills, and boost your resume — all while having fun with like-minded peers.
